metadata.title: Jacob
metadata.description: Venture Capitalist focused on Gaming and AI

hero.name: Jacob
hero.title: At the Intersection of Gaming & AI
hero.tagline: Preparing for the birth of a new industry. I invest in innovative startups combining gaming and AI, partnering with founders building the next generation of entertainment.

home.tagline: I am preparing for the birth of a new industry by combining gaming and AI.
home.expertise: Investment, Biz-Dev, M&A, Gaming, Web Development, Mobile

about.name: Jacob
about.bio: A Venture Capitalist focused on gaming and AI industries. I discover innovative startups and partner with founders to build the next generation of entertainment.

journey.title: Journey
journey.p1: Over 8 years of experience in the startup ecosystem. Starting from early-stage startups, through business development and M&A, I now focus on venture investing.
journey.p2: With deep understanding of the gaming industry and insights into AI technology, I discover new opportunities where these two domains intersect.
journey.p3: Beyond being just an investor, I aim to grow together with founders as a true partner.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: My journey in the startup ecosystem. From developer to product, business development, and venture investing.

writing.title: Writing
writing.description: Thoughts on gaming, AI, startups, and technology.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Investments, advisory roles, and hands-on projects. A collection of experiences across gaming and AI industries.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Whether you have a project proposal, collaboration inquiry, or just want to say hello, I'd love to hear from you.

form.name: Name
form.success: Message sent successfully! I'll get back to you soon.
form.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.

proposal.name: Name
proposal.descriptionPlaceholder: Please describe your project in detail. Include goals, expected outcomes, and any specific requirements.
proposal.success: Proposal submitted successfully! I'll review and get back to you.
proposal.error: Failed to submit proposal. Please try again.
